And the first location for us was a lamp office in Minsk industrial area. Parallels was the first project our engineers were involved in (It was an application where users could use to manage their virtual machines) - and it was our first success! Time passed, more and more projects appeared, more and more mobile engineers joined and in 2015 Mobile division became an independent Mobile unit called BY Mobile Practice.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"So here we
